This page contains initial installation suggestions.

== Prepare Media ==
To install Ubuntu on the Timeline, you can use a cd burnt from a normal Ubuntu ISO image, or create USB storage install media.

* Refer to <nowiki>[[Installation-FromUSBStick]]</nowiki> for directions on creating USB installation media.

== Installation ==
Turn on the machine, and press <F12>.

Select the correct boot device and press <Enter>.

In the <F12> menu:
* USB-HDD refers to a USB storage device.
* CD-ROM refers to internal DVD drive

Installing Ubuntu is straight forward using the Install icon on the desktop

Read on at <nowiki>[[AspireTimeline-Fixes]]</nowiki> to be able to boot into Ubuntu after the installation has finished.
